titles: A briefe description of the triumphant show made by the right honourable Aulgernon Percie, Earle of Northumberland at his installation and intiation into the princely fraternitie of the garter, upon the 13. of May, 1635. To the tune of Quell the pride, &c.
author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?
publisher: for Francis Coules, and are to be sould at his shop in the Old-Bayley,
notes: Signed: M. P., i.e. Martin Parker.
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
